author: flare(flare#0001)
install_msg:
Thank you for installing TikTokReposter! Please make sure to run `[p]tiktokset` to set up the cog.
This cog requires yt-dlp to be installed, please ensure its up to date, this cog also requires ffmpeg which must be installed seperately.
This cog downloads each video and then transcodes them before uploading to discord, this can be IO heavy at times.
name: TikTokReposter
short: Repost TikToks from TikTok to Discord!
description: Repost TikToks from TikTok to Discord automatically or manually!
